title: Ursula's Surprise Visitor | AHS: Double Feature - Episode 3: "Thirst" (HQ Clip)
author: AHS Crave
comment: I feel like Ursula is deffo gonna die and I don’t want her to 😭
I love how he emphasized to not go near the chemists house but when they went literally nothing happened

I adore Ursula she is so funny but i feel like she is gonna be obsessed over the pills and ruin it for all the others who take them but i mean I don’t blame her because if i had the chance to take those pills i would do it too!!
I'm in love with this season and we're only 3 episodes in
description: "Thirst", the third episode of American Horror Story: Double Feature (Part 1 - Red Tide) - written by Brad Falchuk, directed by Loni Peristere - stars Sarah Paulson as Tuberculosis Karen, Evan Peters as Austin Sommers, Lily Rabe as Doris Gardener, Finn Wittrock as Harry Gardener, Ryan Kiera Armstrong as Alma Gardener, Frances Conroy as Belle Noir, Billie Lourd as Lark, Leslie Grossman as Ursula, Adina Porter as Chief Burelson, Angelica Ross as The Chemist, Macaulay Culkin as Mickey, Denis O'Hare as Holden, and Robin Weigert as Martha. All rights belong to FX Networks and Ryan Murphy Television
